cells.text: rotate only in the horizontal plane. This is done by lowering

cells.text: all latitudes without specific compensation for dip. However,

cells.text: One rule of thumb to correct for this leading error is to stop

cells.text: the turn 15 degrees plus half of the latitude (i.e., if the aircraft
